footer.text: Character Guide â€¢ Build: Emilie | Update Date: 08/23/2024 | Editor: zmizuneko

fields.name: Best Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Lumidouce Elegy__
Signature weapon providing most of her needed stats
__Lithic Spear__
Gacha weapon similar in damage output to her signature in Liyue-character heavy teams
__Missive Windspear__
Best free weapon providing EM and ATK, but is from version 3.1
__Kitain Cross Spear__
Best craftable option, providing elemental skill damage bonus and useful energy refund.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon(s):
fields.value:
__Calamity Queller, Prospector's Drill, Staff of Homa, Crimson Moon Semblance,  Staff of Scarlet Sands, Deathmatch, Vortex Vanquisher, Primordial Jade-Spear__
All general stat-sticks which need teammate adjustments to use their passives well.

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands> ATK%|<goblet> Dendro DMG Bonus%|<circlet> CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Skill: Fragrance Extraction
**2)** Elemental Burst: Aromatic Explication
**3)** Normal Attack: Shadow-Hunting Spear (Custom) - *Please see Notes*

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value:
__Energy Requirements__
With signature and no Dendro teammate: 140%
With signature and Dendro teammate: 100%
Without signature and no Dendro teammate: 190%
Without signature but with Dendro teammate: 150%
are recommended values
__Normal Attack Talent__
It is not recommended to level this talent, UNLESS playing C6 Bennett to have her on-field dealing Pyro DMG or triggering Burgeon.
